text: keat( mou sa) ban tb tha noh ku( chea karopromoprieng)rveang khnhom ning anak . amlong pelna muoy kadaoy knongamlongpel teangpir ( brabei chhnam ryy db chhna) del khnhom ban bampenh ku kmean karbampean( som banthem) mk leu khnhom laey . haey a l laoh chea saksaei champoh avei del puok yeung niyeay( promoprieng)
